page.title: 04The Fire Station
page.content: { Watch room.}The watch room has a computer which tells the fire station the message from Taunton where the control room is so when you dial 999 it goes to the control room and then to the fire station.The men get in the fire engine and come to your house. { The kit.}All of the firemen have a yellow helmet except the chief.He has a white helmet.They have black boots with metal caps on the toes, a yellow overcoat, a neckerchief and a hat like a policeman's hat.In Somerton there is not a pole for the firemen to slide down.In two of the fire engine's lockers there are 2 hose reels and in the other 2 it has 9 yellow hose pipes. The firemen are not full time firemen. They only are at the station when the beeper sounds.
